mapper.select: SELECT r.token_value, r.use_yn, r.token_seq, r.user_seq, r.expired_at, r.issued_at FROM REFRESH_TOKEN_INFO r WHERE r.token_value = #{tokenValue}
SELECT r.token_value, r.use_yn, r.token_seq, r.user_seq, r.expired_at, r.issued_at FROM REFRESH_TOKEN_INFO r WHERE r.user_seq = #{userSeq} AND r.use_yn = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REFRESH_TOKEN_INFO(token_value, use_yn, user_seq, expired_at, issued_at) VALUES(#{tokenValue}, #{useYn}, #{userSeq}, #{expiredAt}, #{issuedAt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REFRESH_TOKEN_INFO r WHERE r.token_value = #{tokenValue}
DELETE FROM REFRESH_TOKEN_INFO r WHERE r.user_seq = #{userSeq}
